item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-11-08
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Bunch if folks in line @ the Verizon store in the mall, must be to pick up the Droid. #
  • I'm at The Upper Crust Pizzeria - Coolidge Corner (286 Harvard St, Brookline). #
  • Sun thing @ California Adventure #
  • RT: Lagging behind: How Google uses #Linux #perforce (via @raduboncea) #
  • RT: Freepers outraged that toothless bill may make health insurance slightly cheaper: (via @daveexmachina) #
  • I'm at Diesel Cafe (257 Elm St, at Chester St, Somerville). #
  • Sonoma (our dog) having tummy issues. Sitting @ vets office which smells of birthday cake for some odd reason. #
  • Sonoma @ the vet #
  • Reading - How Much Traffic Does TechCrunch Send You? #
  • Puppy all tucked in after her medicine #
  • RT - Photo: trixiebedlam: Exactly. What Sarah said. (via @katiewest) #

Powered by Twitter Tools
